title: Redemption-Plan.Generate.Input
description: Profile-aware input for the Redemption-Plan.Generate capability.

profile.description: Optional reference to the subject profile to load.

profilePatch.description: Optional modifications to apply to the loaded profile.

goals.description: User-defined reward goals (e.g., cashback, travel, merchandise).

purchase_history.description: Recent purchases used to optimize the plan.

preferences.description: User preferences (e.g., preferred merchants, categories, reward types).
